title: For Integrated Logistic Park & Logistics Park, height of building upto 24 m
clause_text: For Integrated Logistic Park & Logistics Park, height of building upto 24 m. or as per requirement shall be permitted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: For Integrated Logistic Park & Logistics Park, height of building upto 24 m. or as per requirement shall be permitted.
